title: How to Make Blueberry Cheese Pie

steps.headline: Beat the cream cheese and sugar together.
Add the eggs and beat well.
Pour into the graham cracker pie crust.
Place pie onto a baking sheet.
Remove from oven and allow pie to cool completely.
Spread pie filling on top and garnish with Cool Whip, if desired.

text: Beat the cream cheese and sugar together.  Add the eggs and beat well.  Pour into the graham cracker pie crust.  Place pie onto a baking sheet.  Bake at 325 °F (163 °C) for 25 to 30 minutes.  Remove from oven and allow pie to cool completely.  Spread pie filling on top and garnish with Cool Whip, if desired.  Chill overnight.  Keep pie refrigerated.
